tooltip.last_approved_text: By the Lady, this Bretonnian champion excels in melee!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: By the Lady, this Bretonnian champion excels in melee!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Bretonnian Knights are masters of cavalry-based close combat.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Bretonnian Knights are masters of cavalry-based close combat.

tooltip.last_approved_text: It is the Bretonnians that have taken the art of flying cavalry and made it their own.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: It is the Bretonnians that have taken the art of flying cavalry and made it their own.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Cannons and mortars are accurate artillery pieces that cause a lot of damage to a very focused area, making them ideal for taking out strong, single targets.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Cannons and mortars are accurate artillery pieces that cause a lot of damage to a very focused area, making them ideal for taking out strong, single targets.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These siege engines are perfect for firing over your own battle line and over walls, but they are generally less accurate than cannons.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These siege engines are perfect for firing over your own battle line and over walls, but they are generally less accurate than cannons.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fast, and good against smaller targets, cavalry also have more staying power in melee than charge-focused shock cavalry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Fast, and good against smaller targets, cavalry also have more staying power in melee than charge-focused shock cavalry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Flying cavalry have the advantage of more traditional mounted units, but with an even greater range.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Flying cavalry have the advantage of more traditional mounted units, but with an even greater range.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Flying cavalry have the advantages enjoyed by more traditional mounted units but with an even greater range.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Flying cavalry have the advantages enjoyed by more traditional mounted units but with an even greater range.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fast, and good against smaller targets, cavalry also have more staying power in melee than charge-focused shock cavalry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Fast, and good against smaller targets, cavalry also have more staying power in melee than charge-focused shock cavalry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A well-timed charge by these near-unstoppable cavalry units can cause devastating damage.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: A well-timed charge by these near-unstoppable cavalry units can cause devastating damage.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Greenskins ride to war on myriad beasts. Goblin Cavalry is typically light, but fast and manoeuvrable.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Greenskins ride to war on myriad beasts. Goblin Cavalry is typically light, but fast and manoeuvrable.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Greenskins ride to war on myriad beasts. Goblin Cavalry is typically light, but fast and manoeuvrable.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Greenskins ride to war on myriad beasts. Goblin Cavalry is typically light, but fast and manoeuvrable.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fast moving, with a wide turning circle, Chariots can punch through weak enemy units, but are vulnerable if pinned in combat.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Fast moving, with a wide turning circle, Chariots can punch through weak enemy units, but are vulnerable if pinned in combat.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The near-immortal Dragon Ogres bellow their rage at the younger races and hit hard when they charge.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The near-immortal Dragon Ogres bellow their rage at the younger races and hit hard when they charge.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The near-immortal Dragon Ogres bellow their rage at the younger races and hit hard when they charge.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The near-immortal Dragon Ogres bellow their rage at the younger races and hit hard when they charge.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Champions of Chaos are brutal and merciless in combat.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Champions of Chaos are brutal and merciless in combat.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Champions of Chaos are brutal and merciless in combat, when mounted they can close with the enemy more quickly.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Champions of Chaos are brutal and merciless in combat, when mounted they can close with the enemy more quickly.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Champions of Chaos are brutal and merciless in combat, especially when mounted on monstrous beasts.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Champions of Chaos are brutal and merciless in combat, especially when mounted on monstrous beasts.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These large, winged monsters are some of the most powerful creatures in the world.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These large, winged monsters are some of the most powerful creatures in the world.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Flying machines equipped with guns and bombs. As a last resort, they can go into melee and slash at enemies with their rotor blades.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Flying machines equipped with guns and bombs. As a last resort, they can go into melee and slash at enemies with their rotor blades.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Short-range missile infantry that shower the enemy in fiery alchemical fury!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Short-range missile infantry that shower the enemy in fiery alchemical fury!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Medium-range missile infantry that fire high-explosive torpedoes.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Medium-range missile infantry that fire high-explosive torpedoes.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This Engineer puts his ingenuity into field-testing handgun accuracy and range.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: This Engineer puts his ingenuity into field-testing handgun accuracy and range.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Having a Runesmith in the presence of grateful Clans-Dwarfs bolsters their abilities.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Having a Runesmith in the presence of grateful Clans-Dwarfs bolsters their abilities.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Wielding an ancestral axe, a Thane is a melee champion of Hold and Clan.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Wielding an ancestral axe, a Thane is a melee champion of Hold and Clan.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Captains of men are oft-times great fighters as well as leaders.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Captains of men are oft-times great fighters as well as leaders.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Captains are also warriors who excel in melee from horseback.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Captains are also warriors who excel in melee from horseback.

tooltip.last_approved_text: To fight from the back of a rearing Pegasus takes great skill - use his mobility to strike where the fighting is thickest.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: To fight from the back of a rearing Pegasus takes great skill - use his mobility to strike where the fighting is thickest.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Rockets' inaccuracy does not matter much considering the wide area of devastation they cause.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Rockets' inaccuracy does not matter much considering the wide area of devastation they cause.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A steam-powered, full-metal war machine boasting a cannon and an autonomous, short-range turret.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: A steam-powered, full-metal war machine boasting a cannon and an autonomous, short-range turret.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Warrior Priests of Sigmar are powerful fighters whose battle prayers can further bolster their followers' resolve.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Warrior Priests of Sigmar are powerful fighters whose battle prayers can further bolster their followers' resolve.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A Warrior Priest on horseback can preach and fight at greater speed.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: A Warrior Priest on horseback can preach and fight at greater speed.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Witch Hunters are hardy fighters but have good missile capabilities as well.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Witch Hunters are hardy fighters but have good missile capabilities as well.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These smaller cannons, guns and flamethrowers are primarily used against units, not buildings.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These smaller cannons, guns and flamethrowers are primarily used against units, not buildings.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These smaller cannons, guns and flamethrowers are primarily used against units, not buildings.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These smaller cannons, guns and flamethrowers are primarily used against units, not buildings.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Large, aggressive and mostly drunk.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Large, aggressive and mostly drunk.

tooltip.last_approved_text: An eight-legged arachnid monster that offers a surprisingly smooth ride for its bow-wielding passengers.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: An eight-legged arachnid monster that offers a surprisingly smooth ride for its bow-wielding passengers.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A launcher of (more-or-less) guided, insane, living missiles that are primarily used against infantry targets.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: A launcher of (more-or-less) guided, insane, living missiles that are primarily used against infantry targets.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Big Bosses are surprisingly capable in melee, although they will find facing the champions of other races a challenge.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Big Bosses are surprisingly capable in melee, although they will find facing the champions of other races a challenge.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Once on a wolf or a giant spider, a Big Boss is far more mobile - able to boost da boyz' resolve when required.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Once on a wolf or a giant spider, a Big Boss is far more mobile - able to boost da boyz' resolve when required.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Frontline soldiers trained for hand-to-hand combat with their enemies.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Frontline soldiers trained for hand-to-hand combat with their enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Frontline soldiers trained for hand-to-hand combat with their enemies.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Frontline soldiers trained for hand-to-hand combat with their enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: What two-handed axes lack in elegance, they make up for in brutal, armour-shattering force.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: What two-handed axes lack in elegance, they make up for in brutal, armour-shattering force.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Short-range units that can harass the enemy before laying into them with powerful close-combat attacks.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Short-range units that can harass the enemy before laying into them with powerful close-combat attacks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Hammers pay little notice to armour, dealing massive amounts of damage regardless of where they hit.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Hammers pay little notice to armour, dealing massive amounts of damage regardless of where they hit.

tooltip.last_approved_text: An ambushing force that can attack with mattock and blasting charges.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: An ambushing force that can attack with mattock and blasting charges.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Spears offer superior reach over swords and axes, generally making them the better choice against large enemies.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Spears offer superior reach over swords and axes, generally making them the better choice against large enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Similar to spears, halberds are a good choice against large enemies. They are heavier than spears, giving them the edge against armour.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Similar to spears, halberds are a good choice against large enemies. They are heavier than spears, giving them the edge against armour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The sword's main advantage in combat is flexibility. It can be used offensively and defensively, and it offers a good compromise between regular and armour-piercing damage.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The sword's main advantage in combat is flexibility. It can be used offensively and defensively, and it offers a good compromise between regular and armour-piercing damage.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The sword's main advantage in combat is its flexibility. It can be used offensively and defensively, and offers a good compromise between regular and armour-piercing damage.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Metal is full of hexes and high-damage spells; heavily-armoured units are particularly susceptible.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The beasts of the world rise up and obey when summoned, their very essence used to empower and transform the caster.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The beasts of the world rise up and obey when summoned, their very essence used to empower and transform the caster.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Big Waaagh! is a big bombastic lore with lots of intimidating, large spells that meter out damage to the enemy.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Big Waaagh! is a big bombastic lore with lots of intimidating, large spells that meter out damage to the enemy.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Death is an offensive lore with a suite of spells that can assassinate enemy characters and decimate entire units!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Death is an offensive lore with a suite of spells that can assassinate enemy characters and decimate entire units!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Pyromancers are effectively magical artillery, due to the Lore of Fire's selection of aggressive spells, but are not necessarily the most powerful.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Pyromancers are effectively magical artillery, due to the Lore of Fire's selection of aggressive spells, but are not necessarily the most powerful.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Drawn from the skies, the Lore of Heavens is a mix of augmentation spells and powers with potentially devastating consequences for the enemy.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Drawn from the skies, the Lore of Heavens is a mix of augmentation spells and powers with potentially devastating consequences for the enemy.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Life heals those who control it by taking the lifeforce of their opponents!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Life heals those who control it by taking the lifeforce of their opponents!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Light is a defensive Lore concentrated on augmentation spells, especially useful against Undead and Daemonic creatures.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Light is a defensive Lore concentrated on augmentation spells, especially useful against Undead and Daemonic creatures.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Goblin Shamans use spells from the Little Waaagh!, a collection of vindictive spells that can really hurt their opponents.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Goblin Shamans use spells from the Little Waaagh!, a collection of vindictive spells that can really hurt their opponents.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Metal is full of hexes and high-damage spells; heavily-armoured units are particularly susceptible.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Metal is full of hexes and high-damage spells; heavily-armoured units are particularly susceptible.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Nehekhara is focused on damage, either applied directly to the enemy or by enhancing the attack of your Undead legions.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Nehekhara is focused on damage, either applied directly to the enemy or by enhancing the attack of your Undead legions.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Having a Runelord in the presence of grateful Clans-Dwarfs bolsters their abilities.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Having a Runelord in the presence of grateful Clans-Dwarfs bolsters their abilities.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Wizards who harness the Lore of Shadows use aggressive spells to scythe through enemy hearts!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Spells from the Lore of Vampires are used to summon and shackle Undead minions, and curse them too!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Although armed with crude cudgels, a scratch from their filth-encrusted, poisonous claws is more dangerous to most living beings.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Although armed with crude cudgels, a scratch from their filth-encrusted, poisonous claws is more dangerous to most living beings.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Wolves, hounds and other beasts bred for war. Their claws and jaws can splinter bone, but they struggle with decent armour.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Wolves, hounds and other beasts bred for war. Their claws and jaws can splinter bone, but they struggle with decent armour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The scythe is a clumsy weapon in combat not suited for parries or blocks. However, if the wielder is ethereal, it doesn't matter.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The scythe is a clumsy weapon in combat not suited for parries or blocks. However, if the wielder is ethereal, it doesn't matter.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Tomb Banshees are screaming wretches - ethereal beings with a short-range wailing attack.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Tomb Banshees are screaming wretches - ethereal beings with a short-range wailing attack.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These monsters are Vampires consumed by the animalistic hunter within. They are powerful in attack against infantry and other characters.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These monsters are Vampires consumed by the animalistic hunter within. They are powerful in attack against infantry and other characters.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Wight King is an ancient warrior who was rarely bested in his mortal life or this one.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Wight King is an ancient warrior who was rarely bested in his mortal life or this one.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Wight King is an ancient warrior who was rarely bested in his mortal life or this one.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Wight King is an ancient warrior who was rarely bested in his mortal life or this one.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Wolves, hounds and other beasts bred for war. Their claws and jaws can crack skulls, but they struggle against decent armour.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Wolves, hounds and other beasts bred for war. Their claws and jaws can crack skulls, but they struggle against decent armour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Spears offer superior reach over swords and axes, generally making them the better choice against large enemies.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Spears offer superior reach over swords and axes, generally making them the better choice against large enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Towering over the battlefield, statues that once stood sentinel over Nehekhara’s elaborate temples now direct their great strength and fury against the Tomb Kings' many foes.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Towering over the battlefield, statues that once stood sentinel over Nehekhara’s elaborate temples now direct their great strength and fury against the Tomb Kings' many foes.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Wolves, hounds and other beasts bred for war. Their claws and jaws can splinter bone, but they struggle with decent armour.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Wolves, hounds and other beasts bred for war. Their claws and jaws can splinter bone, but they struggle with decent armour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Tormented souls, now freed from their spiritual prison, burst forth in a flash of blinding light to seek out the foe and deliver unbearable madness and death to their door.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Tormented souls, now freed from their spiritual prison, burst forth in a flash of blinding light to seek out the foe and deliver unbearable madness and death to their door.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Radiating a sinister aura of magic, Hierotitans judge and execute the guilty with matchless strength and peerless brutality.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Radiating a sinister aura of magic, Hierotitans judge and execute the guilty with matchless strength and peerless brutality.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Atop their monstrous, snake-like, living statues, Necropolis Knights only need swipe their mounts' mighty tails to shatter the bones of the unfortunate foe.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Atop their monstrous, snake-like, living statues, Necropolis Knights only need swipe their mounts' mighty tails to shatter the bones of the unfortunate foe.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Atop their monstrous, snake-like, living statues, Necropolis Knights only need swipe their mounts' mighty tails to shatter the bones of the unfortunate foe.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Atop their monstrous, snake-like, living statues, Necropolis Knights only need swipe their mounts' mighty tails to shatter the bones of the unfortunate foe.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Those who once stood dormant for centuries, silently guarding Nehekhara’s cities and tombs, are now imbued with magical vigour to unleash furious carnage upon the foe.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Those who once stood dormant for centuries, silently guarding Nehekhara’s cities and tombs, are now imbued with magical vigour to unleash furious carnage upon the foe.

tooltip.last_approved_text: There can be no rest for those born - and reborn to Unlife - whose lot is only to toil for their Tomb King's eternal grandeur.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: There can be no rest for those born - and reborn to Unlife - whose lot is only to toil for their Tomb King's eternal grandeur.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Tomb Scorpions suddenly burst from beneath the sand right into the centre of the fray, using surprise and savagery to quickly gain the advantage.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Tomb Scorpions suddenly burst from beneath the sand right into the centre of the fray, using surprise and savagery to quickly gain the advantage.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Masters of the patient ambush, Sepulchral Stalkers strike at the most opportune moment, surprising and impaling their prey before fixing the terrified foe with their deadly gaze.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Masters of the patient ambush, Sepulchral Stalkers strike at the most opportune moment, surprising and impaling their prey before fixing the terrified foe with their deadly gaze.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fearless as only those who have ‘survived’ death truly can be, Tomb Princes use their mighty halberds to turn away the blows and brace against the weight of large opponents.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Fearless as only those who have ‘survived’ death truly can be, Tomb Princes use their mighty halberds to turn away the blows and brace against the weight of large opponents.

tooltip.last_approved_text: As the Nehekharan gods’ chosen, Ushabti can crush mere men into the sands with their looming girth, never to be seen again.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: As the Nehekharan gods’ chosen, Ushabti can crush mere men into the sands with their looming girth, never to be seen again.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Armed with the lethal Great Bow of the Desert, Ushabti can rain furious death and devastation upon the foe without ever getting too close.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Armed with the lethal Great Bow of the Desert, Ushabti can rain furious death and devastation upon the foe without ever getting too close.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Towering over the battlefield, statues that once stood sentinel over Nehekhara’s elaborate temples now direct their great strength and fury against the Tomb Kings' many foes.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Towering over the battlefield, statues that once stood sentinel over Nehekhara’s elaborate temples now direct their great strength and fury against the Tomb Kings' many foes.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These Cold Ones hunt down their prey in small packs. Although used by Dark Elves too, they are best controlled by Lizardmen.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These Cold Ones hunt down their prey in small packs. Although used by Dark Elves too, they are best controlled by Lizardmen.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These Cold Ones can pierce armour with their spears and perform particularly well against large opponents. Although used by Dark Elves too, they are best controlled by Lizardmen.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These Cold Ones can pierce armour with their spears and perform particularly well against large opponents. Although used by Dark Elves too, they are best controlled by Lizardmen.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Dark Elf Death Hags are the keepers of Khaine's bloody mysteries; they mix murderous medicines, then dip and use their poisoned blades deftly in melee.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Dark Elf Death Hags are the keepers of Khaine's bloody mysteries; they mix murderous medicines, then dip and use their poisoned blades deftly in melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Forever in Khaine's service, on the battlefield the heartless Witch Elves carry a pair of poisoned daggers with which to do their endless, bloody work.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Forever in Khaine's service, on the battlefield the heartless Witch Elves carry a pair of poisoned daggers with which to do their endless, bloody work.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Swift and silent, the scouts of the Dark Elf race are stealthy soldiers, further braced by the unforgiving conditions of the Blackspine Mountains from which they hail.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Swift and silent, the scouts of the Dark Elf race are stealthy soldiers, further braced by the unforgiving conditions of the Blackspine Mountains from which they hail.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Just as stealthy as others of their kind, these Dark Elf Shades carry two deadly blades in addition to their lethal bows.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Just as stealthy as others of their kind, these Dark Elf Shades carry two deadly blades in addition to their lethal bows.

tooltip.last_approved_text: You can be stealthy whilst carrying a great weapon; these Shades have long-mastered use of terrain combined with silent movement to take their opponents (very nastily) by surprise.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: You can be stealthy whilst carrying a great weapon; these Shades have long-mastered use of terrain combined with silent movement to take their opponents (very nastily) by surprise.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These missile-armed Dark Elves carry short-range handbows to cause maximum damage up close before, like all the best skirmishers, feinting to range to begin all over again.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These missile-armed Dark Elves carry short-range handbows to cause maximum damage up close before, like all the best skirmishers, feinting to range to begin all over again.

tooltip.last_approved_text: You've seen a Hydra before, right? Well this one is far stronger and infinitely more ferocious than its feral cousin; take a War Hydra on at your peril!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: You've seen a Hydra before, right? Well this one is far stronger and infinitely more ferocious than its feral cousin; take a War Hydra on at your peril!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Khaine's chosen assassins are trained from the very beginning of their lives to kill up close in the name of the Bloody-handed God.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Khaine's chosen assassins are trained from the very beginning of their lives to kill up close in the name of the Bloody-handed God.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Well-respected war leaders in their own right, High Elf Nobles have developed their considerable skill-at-arms over many years of intensive experience in melee combat.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Well-respected war leaders in their own right, High Elf Nobles have developed their considerable skill-at-arms over many years of intensive experience in melee combat.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These gifted warriors are also master magic-users, each with a faultless grasp of the principles of magical lore.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These gifted warriors are also master magic-users, each with a faultless grasp of the principles of magical lore.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These highly-trained skirmishers are also proficient in melee, with the well-honed discipline to form a spear wall that can meet all-comers head on.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These highly-trained skirmishers are also proficient in melee, with the well-honed discipline to form a spear wall that can meet all-comers head on.

tooltip.last_approved_text: When enraged in battle, the plumage of the majestic Flamespyre Phoenix combusts, leaving angry, deadly fire trailing behind it.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: When enraged in battle, the plumage of the majestic Flamespyre Phoenix combusts, leaving angry, deadly fire trailing behind it.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The aged, cooled Frostheart Phoenix no longer possesses the fire it once commanded, but remains a hardy, formidable battlefield opponent.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The aged, cooled Frostheart Phoenix no longer possesses the fire it once commanded, but remains a hardy, formidable battlefield opponent.

tooltip.last_approved_text: For most melee infantry, effective use of a single blade takes a lifetime's disciplined study and practice. These formidable sword-armed warriors use two; think on that for a moment...

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: For most melee infantry, effective use of a single blade takes a lifetime's disciplined study and practice. These formidable sword-armed warriors use two; think on that for a moment...

tooltip.last_approved_text: Proficient in melee and missile combat alike, a fast mount grants this Lord much tactical flexibility.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Proficient in melee and missile combat alike, a fast mount grants this Lord much tactical flexibility.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Some Lords are just as deadly with a missile weapon as they are with blade, axe or hammer.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Some Lords are just as deadly with a missile weapon as they are with blade, axe or hammer.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Monstrous creatures are typically several feet taller than men and capable of stomping weaker foes into the ground.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Monstrous creatures are typically several feet taller than men and capable of stomping weaker foes into the ground.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The courage to walk Dark Magic's more direct, immediate, and dangerous path to spellcraft requires an uncanny sharpness of mind and bloody-minded determination.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The courage to walk Dark Magic's more direct, immediate, and dangerous path to spellcraft requires an uncanny sharpness of mind and bloody-minded determination.

tooltip.last_approved_text: High Magic practitioners, proficient in using all the Winds of Magic, are supremely powerful beings whose spells are way beyond ordinary mortal understanding.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: High Magic practitioners, proficient in using all the Winds of Magic, are supremely powerful beings whose spells are way beyond ordinary mortal understanding.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Virulent disease - insidious, creeping, contagions leading to hideous infirmity, madness and death. If ever pestilence needed a helping hand, this Wizard provides it.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Virulent disease - insidious, creeping, contagions leading to hideous infirmity, madness and death. If ever pestilence needed a helping hand, this Wizard provides it.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Sudden, unnatural gales and lethal bolts of Warp-lightning from the sky, ground-splitting earthquakes and scorching fire from the soil – each one delivered in the Horned Rat’s undying name.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Sudden, unnatural gales and lethal bolts of Warp-lightning from the sky, ground-splitting earthquakes and scorching fire from the soil – each one delivered in the Horned Rat’s undying name.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Dinosaurs are mostly feral; as such, they are difficult to control and prone to rampaging.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Dinosaurs are mostly feral; as such, they are difficult to control and prone to rampaging.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Dinosaurs, ridden by javelin-throwing Skinks and fitted with heavy siege weapons, are just as good in melee as their feral counterparts but no longer prone to rampaging.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Dinosaurs, ridden by javelin-throwing Skinks and fitted with heavy siege weapons, are just as good in melee as their feral counterparts but no longer prone to rampaging.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Some dinosaurs carry a platform with which to support their army, such as the Bastiladon with the Lizardmen's Revivification Crystal.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Some dinosaurs carry a platform with which to support their army, such as the Bastiladon with the Lizardmen's Revivification Crystal.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lizardmen's Saurus Scar-Veterans are highly-seasoned melee fighters, with few equals among their adversaries on the field.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lizardmen's Saurus Scar-Veterans are highly-seasoned melee fighters, with few equals among their adversaries on the field.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Second in stature only to the priestly-class, the wily Skink Chiefs are masters of both clandestine mayhem and irregular, skirmish warfare.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Second in stature only to the priestly-class, the wily Skink Chiefs are masters of both clandestine mayhem and irregular, skirmish warfare.

tooltip.last_approved_text: An indelicate weapon at the best of times, the cudgel is doubly-crushing when wielded by a cold-blooded Skink.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: An indelicate weapon at the best of times, the cudgel is doubly-crushing when wielded by a cold-blooded Skink.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Temple Guard, armed with a halberd -mace, are the only Saurus Infantry disciplined enough never to rampage.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Temple Guard, armed with a halberd -mace, are the only Saurus Infantry disciplined enough never to rampage.

tooltip.last_approved_text: As the Saurus wield their sword-maces they are fighting two foes: their opponent and their own primal instincts.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: As the Saurus wield their sword-maces they are fighting two foes: their opponent and their own primal instincts.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Skinks with blowpipes use poison darts at short range, with a high rate of fire; they can also fire whilst moving.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Skinks with blowpipes use poison darts at short range, with a high rate of fire; they can also fire whilst moving.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Terradons, fragile yet extremely fast, can soar above the battlefield to drop a single load (usually rocks) upon the unsuspecting foe; their riders carry fireleech bolas or javelins.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Terradons, fragile yet extremely fast, can soar above the battlefield to drop a single load (usually rocks) upon the unsuspecting foe; their riders carry fireleech bolas or javelins.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Javelin-armed missile infantry cause high damage, but only over a short range.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Javelin-armed missile infantry cause high damage, but only over a short range.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Never discount the humble sling, lest you get a very nasty surprise courtesy of an expert trained from childhood in its deadliest of uses! Slings have a high arc of fire and are best used at medium range.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Never discount the humble sling, lest you get a very nasty surprise courtesy of an expert trained from childhood in its deadliest of uses! Slings have a high arc of fire and are best used at medium range.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The dreaded Skaven Doomwheel charges forth with unparalleled crushing power, spewing lightning attacks from all sides.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The dreaded Skaven Doomwheel charges forth with unparalleled crushing power, spewing lightning attacks from all sides.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Of the many shocking, hideous abominations created by Skavenkind, the magically-resistant horrors of the Hell Pit are hand-reared and fed just enough to make them more than a little dangerous in battle.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Of the many shocking, hideous abominations created by Skavenkind, the magically-resistant horrors of the Hell Pit are hand-reared and fed just enough to make them more than a little dangerous in battle.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The fanatical Plague Monks use their censers to spread virulent diseases as well as for flailing their unfortunate opponents to an ignoble, unmerciful death.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The fanatical Plague Monks use their censers to spread virulent diseases as well as for flailing their unfortunate opponents to an ignoble, unmerciful death.

tooltip.last_approved_text: As the elite warriors of the Skaven army, the black-furred Stormvermin are armed with halberds with which to carry out their precision melee assault.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: As the elite warriors of the Skaven army, the black-furred Stormvermin are armed with halberds with which to carry out their precision melee assault.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These Skaven Death Runners are armed with Warpstone and magic-infused 'Weeping Blades', to melt armour and make even the merest scratch a fatal flesh wound.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These Skaven Death Runners are armed with Warpstone and magic-infused 'Weeping Blades', to melt armour and make even the merest scratch a fatal flesh wound.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These deadly Skaven melee masters are armed with swords with which to cut a disease-ridden swathe through enemy lines.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These deadly Skaven melee masters are armed with swords with which to cut a disease-ridden swathe through enemy lines.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Although hand-thrown and therefore short range by design, there's nothing weak about the virulent maladies contained within these globes, as those caught in their blast would testify if indeed they'd lived to tell the tale!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Although hand-thrown and therefore short range by design, there's nothing weak about the virulent maladies contained within these globes, as those caught in their blast would testify if indeed they'd lived to tell the tale!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Although hand-thrown and therefore short-range by design, there's nothing weak about the virulent maladies contained within these globes, as those caught in their blast would testify if indeed they'd lived to tell the tale!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Although hand-thrown and therefore short-range by design, there's nothing weak about the virulent maladies contained within these globes, as those caught in their blast would testify if indeed they'd lived to tell the tale!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Although short of range due to being hand-thrown in battle, do not discount the effectiveness of quick-firing, massed throwing stars against tightly-packed opponents!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Although short of range due to being hand-thrown in battle, do not discount the effectiveness of quick-firing, massed throwing stars against tightly-packed opponents!

tooltip.last_approved_text: There's nothing the feared, lethal assassins of Clan Eshin don't know about hand-to-hand combat and securing that essential kill in the unforgiving cut-and-thrust of melee.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: There's nothing the feared, lethal assassins of Clan Eshin don't know about hand-to-hand combat and securing that essential kill in the unforgiving cut-and-thrust of melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The courage to walk Dark Magic's more direct, immediate, and dangerous path to spellcraft requires an uncanny sharpness of mind and bloody-minded determination.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The courage to walk Dark Magic's more direct, immediate, and dangerous path to spellcraft requires an uncanny sharpness of mind and bloody-minded determination.

tooltip.last_approved_text: High Magic practitioners, proficient in using all the Winds of Magic, are supremely powerful beings whose spells are way beyond ordinary mortal understanding.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: High Magic practitioners, proficient in using all the Winds of Magic, are supremely powerful beings whose spells are way beyond ordinary mortal understanding.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Virulent disease - insidious, creeping, contagions leading to hideous infirmity, madness and death. If ever pestilence needed a helping hand, this Wizard provides it.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Virulent disease - insidious, creeping, contagions leading to hideous infirmity, madness and death. If ever pestilence needed a helping hand, this Wizard provides it.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Sudden, unnatural gales and lethal bolts of Warp-lightning from the sky, ground-splitting earthquakes and scorching fire from the soil – each one delivered in the Horned Rat’s undying name.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Sudden, unnatural gales and lethal bolts of Warp-lightning from the sky, ground-splitting earthquakes and scorching fire from the soil – each one delivered in the Horned Rat’s undying name.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Brutal beasts, striding into battle to wreak havoc.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Brutal beasts, striding into battle to wreak havoc.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These monsters smash their foes to pieces with huge, armour-rending weapons.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These monsters smash their foes to pieces with huge, armour-rending weapons.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fearsome beasts, armed with a pair of lethal throwing axes – running away will not help.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Fearsome beasts, armed with a pair of lethal throwing axes – running away will not help.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Cygor is a beast without peer, hurling rocks from afar to smash enemies before they can close on its imposing physique.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Cygor is a beast without peer, hurling rocks from afar to smash enemies before they can close on its imposing physique.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These units excel in the thick of the fight, tearing the foe to shreds with savage strength and wild abandon.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These units excel in the thick of the fight, tearing the foe to shreds with savage strength and wild abandon.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These larger-than-usual beasts bear down upon their enemies on the battlefield, rending them apart with bestial fury and cruel determination.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These larger-than-usual beasts bear down upon their enemies on the battlefield, rending them apart with bestial fury and cruel determination.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Huge beasts of war, powerful beyond reckoning, take to the battlefield with enormous weapons capable of felling the mightiest warrior.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Huge beasts of war, powerful beyond reckoning, take to the battlefield with enormous weapons capable of felling the mightiest warrior.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Armour is little barrier to maces, and as such they cause great damage wherever they hit. However, actually scoring a hit can be a challenge, as a large spiky ball can easily miss its mark.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Armour is little barrier to maces, and as such they cause great damage wherever they hit. However, actually scoring a hit can be a challenge, as a large spiky ball can easily miss its mark.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Winged creatures who prey on weaker foes in hand-to-hand combat.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Winged creatures who prey on weaker foes in hand-to-hand combat.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Vicious in hand-to-hand combat, these shapeshifting spirit-creatures prey on the unsuspecting.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Vicious in hand-to-hand combat, these shapeshifting spirit-creatures prey on the unsuspecting.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Masters of both sword and bow, Glade Lords can cause great damage from near or afar.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Masters of both sword and bow, Glade Lords can cause great damage from near or afar.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The glaive is a large, lethal, bladed weapon with improved armour-piercing capabilities.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The glaive is a large, lethal, bladed weapon with improved armour-piercing capabilities.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These larger-than-usual beasts bear down upon their enemies on the battlefield, rending them apart with bestial fury and cruel determination.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: These larger-than-usual beasts bear down upon their enemies on the battlefield, rending them apart with bestial fury and cruel determination.

tooltip.last_approved_text: With vision as sharp as a bird’s, these precision archers can target and destroy their foes before disappearing just as quickly as they appeared.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: With vision as sharp as a bird’s, these precision archers can target and destroy their foes before disappearing just as quickly as they appeared.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Either thrown or used in melee, the Spear of Kurnous offers superior reach over a sword or axe, making it an ideal choice against larger enemies.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Either thrown or used in melee, the Spear of Kurnous offers superior reach over a sword or axe, making it an ideal choice against larger enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fast and good when fighting infantry, this cavalry unit can also cast aggressive spells.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Fast and good when fighting infantry, this cavalry unit can also cast aggressive spells.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Towering over their enemies, these living trees protect the forest with brute force when necessary.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Towering over their enemies, these living trees protect the forest with brute force when necessary.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Masters of both sword and bow, Waystalkers can cause great damage from near or afar.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Masters of both sword and bow, Waystalkers can cause great damage from near or afar.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fast and good against smaller targets, this cavalry unit also has greater staying power in melee than charge-focused shock cavalry.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Fast and good against smaller targets, this cavalry unit also has greater staying power in melee than charge-focused shock cavalry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: With a long range, Bolt Throwers are able to cause great damage but are very weak in melee.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: With a long range, Bolt Throwers are able to cause great damage but are very weak in melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Armed with razor-sharp daggers, these Goblins strike hard, causing lethal armour piercing damage before scurrying away under a confounding cloud of smoke.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Armed with razor-sharp daggers, these Goblins strike hard, causing lethal armour piercing damage before scurrying away under a confounding cloud of smoke.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Squigs’ fearsome mandibles can crack skulls with ease, gobbling men up like so many mushrooms in a feeding trough.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Squigs’ fearsome mandibles can crack skulls with ease, gobbling men up like so many mushrooms in a feeding trough.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Greenskins ride to war on myriad beasts. Goblin Cavalry is typically light, but fast and manoeuvrable.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Greenskins ride to war on myriad beasts. Goblin Cavalry is typically light, but fast and manoeuvrable.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A support infantry unit reinforces others with its aura and strikes foes with powerful magical attacks.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: A support infantry unit reinforces others with its aura and strikes foes with powerful magical attacks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: By the Lady, this Bretonnian champion excels in melee!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: By the Lady, this Bretonnian champion excels in melee!

tooltip.last_approved_text: The beasts of the world rise up and obey when summoned, their very essence used to empower and transform the caster.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The beasts of the world rise up and obey when summoned, their very essence used to empower and transform the caster.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The beasts of the world rise up and obey when summoned, their very essence used to empower and transform the caster.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The beasts of the world rise up and obey when summoned, their very essence used to empower and transform the caster.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The beasts of the world rise up and obey when summoned, their very essence used to empower and transform the caster.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The beasts of the world rise up and obey when summoned, their very essence used to empower and transform the caster.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The beasts of the world rise up and obey when summoned, their very essence used to empower and transform the caster.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Big Waaagh! is a big bombastic lore with lots of intimidating, large spells that meter out damage to the enemy.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Big Waaagh! is a big bombastic lore with lots of intimidating, large spells that meter out damage to the enemy.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Big Waaagh! is a big bombastic lore with lots of intimidating, large spells that meter out damage to the enemy.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Big Waaagh! is a big bombastic lore with lots of intimidating, large spells that meter out damage to the enemy.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Death is an offensive lore with a suite of spells that can assassinate enemy characters and decimate entire units!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Death is an offensive lore with a suite of spells that can assassinate enemy characters and decimate entire units!

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Death is an offensive lore with a suite of spells that can assassinate enemy characters and decimate entire units!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Death is an offensive lore with a suite of spells that can assassinate enemy characters and decimate entire units!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Pyromancers are effectively magical artillery, due to the Lore of Fire's selection of aggressive spells, but are not necessarily the most powerful.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Pyromancers are effectively magical artillery, due to the Lore of Fire's selection of aggressive spells, but are not necessarily the most powerful.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Pyromancers are effectively magical artillery, due to the Lore of Fire's selection of aggressive spells, but are not necessarily the most powerful.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Drawn from the skies, the Lore of Heavens is a mix of augmentation spells and powers with potentially devastating consequences for the enemy.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Drawn from the skies, the Lore of Heavens is a mix of augmentation spells and powers with potentially devastating consequences for the enemy.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Drawn from the skies, the Lore of Heavens is a mix of augmentation spells and powers with potentially devastating consequences for the enemy.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Drawn from the skies, the Lore of Heavens is a mix of augmentation spells and powers with potentially devastating consequences for the enemy.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Drawn from the skies, the Lore of Heavens is a mix of augmentation spells and powers with potentially devastating consequences for the enemy.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Life heals those who control it by taking the lifeforce of their opponents!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Life heals those who control it by taking the lifeforce of their opponents!

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Life heals those who control it by taking the lifeforce of their opponents!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Life heals those who control it by taking the lifeforce of their opponents!

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Life heals those who control it, whilst taking the lifeforce of their opponents!

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Life heals those who control it, whilst taking the lifeforce of their opponents!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Light is a defensive Lore concentrated on augmentation spells, especially useful against Undead and Daemonic creatures.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Light is a defensive Lore concentrated on augmentation spells, especially useful against Undead and Daemonic creatures.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Light is a defensive Lore concentrated on augmentation spells, especially useful against Undead and Daemonic creatures.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Light is a defensive Lore concentrated on augmentation spells, especially useful against Undead and Daemonic creatures.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Light is a defensive Lore concentrated on augmentation spells, especially useful against Undead and Daemonic creatures.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Light is a defensive Lore concentrated on augmentation spells, especially useful against Undead and Daemonic creatures.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Goblin Shamans use spells from the Little Waaagh!, a collection of vindictive spells that can really hurt their opponents.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: Goblin Shamans use spells from the Little Waaagh!, a collection of vindictive spells that can really hurt their opponents.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Metal is full of hexes and high-damage spells; units with lots of armour are particularly susceptible.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Metal is full of hexes and high-damage spells; units with lots of armour are particularly susceptible.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Metal is full of hexes and high-damage spells; units with lots of armour are particularly susceptible.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Metal is full of hexes and high-damage spells; units with lots of armour are particularly susceptible.

ui_unit_groupings.tooltip: The Lore of Metal is full of hexes and high-damage spells; units with lots of armour are particularly susceptible.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Lore of Nehekhara is focused on damage, either applied directly to the enemy or by enhancing the attack of your Undead legions.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Wizards who harness the Lore of Shadows use aggressive spells to scythe through enemy hearts!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Spells from the Lore of Vampires are used to summon and shackle Undead minions, and curse them too!

tooltip.last_approved_text: Nature can be both shield and weapon, brought to bear against the enemy or to defend allied troops.
